alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf; South Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 5:40PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Gulf, Bay, southwestern Calhoun, southern Walton and southern Washington Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 630 PM EDT/530 PM CDT/... At 540 PM EDT/440 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southeast of Destin to near Santa Rosa Beach to 23 miles southeast of Eglin Air Force Base to near Panama City Beach to near Callaway to 8 miles southwest of Mexico Beach to 15 miles west of Port St. Joe. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Santa Rosa Beach, Port St. Joe, Springfield, Mexico Beach, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Eglin Air Force Base, Live Oak, Parker, Freeport, Ebro, Villa Tasso, Allanton, Dirego Park, College Station and Gulf Resort Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf; South Walton; Washington
